title: Tooth for Tooth
description: What would you do if you got away with murder? Would you stop there? Could you?Susie and Roy thought that they committed the perfect crime.Their planning was meticulous. Their execution was flawless. But, there is always a loose end, isnâ€™t there? Always a singing bone.Now, while enemies multiply and suspicions abound, their perfect world begins to crumble.The hunters have become the hunted.
author: J.K. Franko
